sentences.english: Rinse the cucumber with cold water, and drain on paper towels.
sentences.chinese: 用冷水將黃瓜丁衝淨，用餐巾紙吸乾淨水分。

sentences.english: Don't tuck the napkin in your vest or put it under chin like a baby's bib.
sentences.chinese: 不要把餐巾塞入馬甲或圍在下顎像嬰兒的圍兜。

sentences.english: The chopsticks are sealed inside a paper bag along with a piece of napkin.
sentences.chinese: 一個密封的紙袋內，有一雙筷子，還有一塊餐巾。

sentences.english: She tucked her scarf into her Blouse.
I could eliminate paper napkins and towels entirely.
sentences.chinese: 我可以完全淘汰餐巾紙和擦手紙。

sentences.english: Get help from a paper napkin.
Or: Did someone forget to put his napkin in his lap?
sentences.chinese: 或者，有人忘了把餐巾放在膝上了嗎？

sentences.english: He only kisses his wife when he has run out of napkin.
sentences.chinese: 他只有在餐巾紙用完時纔會親吻老婆。

sentences.english: I take it one step further and nix the cute napkin holders. Each family member simply gets a different-colored napkin.
sentences.chinese: 每個家庭成員都有一塊不同顏色的餐巾。

sentences.english: No one wants to see your stained napkin.
sentences.chinese: 沒人願意看到你那帶了污跡的餐巾。

sentences.english: You can design a dog house on a napkin.
sentences.chinese: 可以在一張餐巾紙上設計一間狗舍。

sentences.english: Cloth napkins last years, not only 50 uses.
sentences.chinese: 餐巾布持續使用幾年，不僅僅用50次。

sentences.english: Then she noticed something written on the napkin.
sentences.chinese: 就在這時，她發現餐巾上寫着字。

sentences.english: But can the girl at least get a napkin to clean herself up afterwards?
sentences.chinese: 但是，至少可以事後拿張餐巾紙清理一下自己吧？

sentences.english: I took another drink and turned over the napkin.
sentences.chinese: 我又喝了一口酒，把餐巾紙翻過來看。
